name: London Brick Lane Photo Skills Safari
description:
Discover the amazing street art, history and culture on and around London's famous Brick Lane, in the company of a full time professional photographer. Brush up on your photography skills and get a unique perspective on how to shoot better travel photos. I'll share my knowledge and skills to get you set up and ready to shoot better pictures on your travels. Make the most of your time in London and let a professional photographer
 guide you through one of the most photogenic urban areas in Europe. See
 a side to the city that not all tourists will experience and learn new 
camera skills at the same time.
